data.name: Killer Instinct - The Complete Soundtrack
data.detailed_description: This soundtrack contains all of the pulse-pounding music from Killer Instinct: Season 1, 2, and 3 along with all of the tracks from the original Killer Instinct games!  ULTIMATE SOUNDTRACK COMBO!
data.about_the_game: This soundtrack contains all of the pulse-pounding music from Killer Instinct: Season 1, 2, and 3 along with all of the tracks from the original Killer Instinct games!  ULTIMATE SOUNDTRACK COMBO!
data.short_description: This soundtrack contains all of the pulse-pounding music from Killer Instinct: Season 1, 2, and 3 along with all of the tracks from the original Killer Instinct games! ULTIMATE SOUNDTRACK COMBO!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian
*languages with full audio support
